Post._content:
### Related Posts ------ > IHIS **'HL7 C-CDA '** pdf . ------ :book:****:book: ----- 1.[Pre-Consolidation context](#pre-consolidation-context) 2.[Consolidated CDA](#consolidated-cda) 3.[C-CDA IG Navigation](#c-cda-ig-navigation) ## Pre-Consolidation context ##### CDA ICT(Information and Communication System) . . *HITSP, HL7, IHE, Health Story* **CDA(Clinical Document Architecture)** , **CDA Implementation Guide(CDA IG)** . . ![C-CDA](/img/c-cda.png) ## Consolidated CDA 2012 the Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology(ONC) **Consolidated CDA ** [^1] . HL7 2011 12 'A draft Implementation Guide for CDA Release 2.0, Consolidated CDA Templates'[^2] . **C-CDA IG** (year released) - Consultation Note(2008) - Discharge Summary(2009) - Imaging Integration and DICOM Diagnostic Imaging Reports(DIR)(2009) - History and Physical(H&P)(2008) - Operative Note(2009) - Progress Note(2010) - Procedure Note(2010) - Unstructured documents(2010) ![C-CDA2](/img/c-cda2.png) ## C-CDA IG Navigation Consolidated CDA . [HL7 Implementation Guide for CDA Release 2:IHE Health Story Consolidation, Release 1.1 - US Realm](http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_matrix.cfm)


[^1]: [Consolidated Clinical Document Architecture ](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clinical_Document_Architecture) [^2]: HL7 .

# Hello, Python! **Python** [ (Monty Python)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Python) . python (spam) (skit) ? ` 25 7 50 ` - [youtube ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zLih-WQwBSc) , . ```python spam_amout = 0 print(spam_amout) #, , , , spam_amout = spam_amout + 4 if spam_amount >0: print("But I don't want ANY spam!") viking_song = "Spam " * spam_amount print(viking_song) ``` ``` 0 But I don't want ANY spam! Spam Spam Spam Spam ```
, . , . .
```python spam_amount = 0 ``` ** ** : `spam_amount` = 0 . > **!** : (Java C ++ ) . > > > `spam_amount` "(declar)" . > > `spam_amount` . , (string) (boolean) `spam_amount` .
```python print(spam_amout) # 0 ``` ** ** : `print` . ( ) .
```python #, , , , spam_amout = spam_amout + 4 ``` **(comment)** . `#` . (reassignment) . . <- = . `spam_amount` . (0 + 4 = 4) `=` .
```python if spam_amount > 0: print("But I don't want ANY spam!") # But I don't want ANY spam! viking_song = "Spam Spam Spam" print(viking_song) #Spam Spam Spam ``` **(conditional)** , . . `if` . `"But I don't want ANY spam!"` `spam_amount` . `print (viking_song)` . ( ) ? `if` (line) (`:`) " " . ** ** . `{` `}` . Python , . `viking_song` 4 `if` . (loops) . (snippet) **(string) ** . ```python "But I don't want ANY spam!" ``` . ( .)
```python viking_song = "Spam " * spam_amount print(viking_song) # Spam Spam Spam Spam ``` `*` (`3 * 3` 9 ), . `*` `+` . (: [operator overloading](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operator_overloading))

## (Numbers and arithmetic in Python) . ```python spam_amout = 0 ``` (type) "Number" `spam_amout` type . ```python type(spam_amout) # int ``` `nt` (short for integer) . ```python type(19.95) # float ``` `float` - (weight) (proportion) . `type()` `print()` . " ?" .
(number) (arithmetic). `+` , `*` (sort ). . | Operator | Name | Description | | :------- | :------------- | :------------------------------------------------- | | `a + b` | Addition | Sum of `a` and `b` | | `a - b` | Subtraction | Difference of `a` and `b` | | `a * b` | Multiplication | Product of `a` and `b` | | `a / b` | True division | Quotient of `a` and `b` | | `a // b` | Floor division | Quotient of `a` and `b`, removing fractional parts | | `a % b` | Modulus | Integer remainder after division of `a` by `b` | | `a ** b` | Exponentiation | `a` raised to the power of `b` | | `-a` | Negation | The negative of `a` |
. "True division" . ```python print(5 / 2) # 2.5 print(6 / 2) # 3.0 ``` `float` .
`//` . ```python print(5 // 2) # 2 print(6 // 2) # 3 ``` ? .

### (Order of operations) . ` PEMDAS - Parentheses, Exponents, Multiplication/Division, Addition/Subtraction ` -> -> / -> / . . . ```python 8 - 3 + 2 # 7 -3 + 4 * 2 # 5 ``` . ```python hat_height_cm = 25 my_height_cm = 190 # How tall am I, in meters, when wearing my hat? total_height_meters = hat_height_cm + my_height_cm / 100 print("Height in meters =", total_height_meters, "?") # Height in meters = 26.9 ? ``` **(parentheses)** . (sub-expression) . ```python total_height_meters = (hat_height_cm + my_height_cm) / 100 print("Height in meters =", total_height_meters) # Height in meters = 2.15 ``` ### (Builtin functions for working with numbers) `min` `max` . ```python print(min(1, 2, 3)) # 1 print(max(1, 2, 3)) # 3 ``` `abs` . ```python print(abs(32)) # 32 print(abs(-32)) # 32 ``` `int` `float` (type) . ```python print(float(10)) # 10.0 print(int(3.33)) # 3 # (string) ! print(int('807') + 1) # 808 ```

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
